Title: Relates to casting and counting absentee ballots without postmarked dates within three days following the day of election
Summary: Establishes provisions requiring absentee ballots that do not have postmarked dates that are received in the mail by the board of elections within three days following the day of election to be cast and counted.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to casting and counting absentee ballots without postmarked dates within three days following the day of election
